nodes.bodyText:
Optional: It'd be useful to add an integration test to confirm that if a child is added, the expander is visible.
I believe this is fine currently, as the control is fully refreshed, but this behaviour is subject to change in the future.

Can you please let me know what you mean by "child is added". As far as I understand, there is no notion of "adding" in the deck picker process. Checking whether a collection is displayed properly seems useful. Checking changes does not seems to have sens here as far as I can tell
the YES constant here is unused it appears?

Bad merge. Thanks for catching it. It's important, because without this extra line, when the first subdeck is added to a deck, the "collapse" button would not have been found by accessibility app I fear
